content: So much internalized raged toward fathers (men). I worry for her son and what poison has been poured into his head. Worse, trapped in the Marxist narrative of oppressed and oppressor ~victim and victimizer ~ I don’t see how she can find a way out. The problem isn’t ‘fathers’, or fatherhood. It is the lack of empathy, respect and communication. There is nothing wrong and everything wonderful about demanding a partnership. This does not mean surrendering gender identities though. Instead, people should insist on shared responsibility and support. Guys shouldn’t stop being guys — they should stop being jerks. Anyone, man, or woman, who thinks they can have it all will soon discover they end up with nothing really worth having.
